name: Copy Mat
description: Analog of simple Copy operation, but can provide better performance if the result should be OpenCV matrix (but the source is not OpenCV)

items.caption: UMat if the input is UMat, else Mat

controls.caption: Clone data
controls.name: cloneData
controls.description:
Without this flag, this function will pass only the reference (if it is possible, i.e. if the input matrix is already OpenCV Mat/UMat, according the previous parameter).
For UMat result, cloning allows to guarantee that the result will be actually placed in GPU memory.
